Articles.Content: (So, on with the story?)
This is your center of operability. If you do not surrender to us, and tell your people to stand down, we will engage. You will be responsible for the loss of all lives.

\*To self\* never back down, never back down, NEVER BACK DOWN! 

\*Continues his charge, taking the weapons from the creatures he takes down and using them against them, slowly making his way to the bridge to face the "captain"\*
[There is no bridge]
( you mean i gotta clear the whole ship?! This is gonna take a while...)
[You can try. The more you attack, the more they adapt]

\*Somewhere else in the ship, a squad of enemies locate a bomb as it explodes in their faces, killing them instantly\*

- - - Updated - - -

Sampa begins to fall back and safely moves xannari's body to the gas cure room on the light cruiser Mikasa

- - - Updated - - -

To the citadel: Junior,, come in!
I read you! The diplomats are trying to sue me! It's the diplomat apocalypse! Permission to stun them!

> 
> I read you! The diplomats are trying to sue me! It's the diplomat apocalypse! Permission to stun them!

Justvcall,c-sec forces to deal,with them. Anyway, we have a problem. We have enemy forces inbound to the citadel, i need you to activate its defenses. All weapons and shields on rotating frequencies. Also, i want you to prepare a room in the medical ward, i have an injured friend here and she needs to be admitted...stat!

On it!'

Done.

> 
> On it!'
> Done.

Have the medics,meet me at docking ring D-24, eta 2 minutes

Attention inhabitants of this sector! We have analysed your defenses thoroughly as being unable to withstand us! Allow yourselves to give in, or there will be consequences! You have 1 minute to make a decision.

Medics are there!

- - - Updated - - -

Who requires a medic, exactly? Name?

Pulling into the docking bay, just a warning, this...friend...is going to be a shock to you...c you at the entrance.

\*Leaves the ship close behind the body of xannari.
Well... about the attackers... we lost a ship full of diplomats from a system seeking to join us. From the Zaon System.
Your minute is over! What shall it be? No response will be assumed a denial, and will engage.
Sorry. I was preoccupied. That's Xannari's body, but that's Xannari posting. is this like Red VS blue, where the main character was secretly an AI in human form?
(She plays the role of herself and the attackers)
Oops.
No response? Very well. Begin extracting natural resources for analysis.

Have the citadel begin to open fire...i need to make a call to cerberus high command...

- - - Updated - - -

\*The entire alliance fleet opens up on the attackers\*
There. SHOOTING! BLAM BLAM! I beam several annoying diplomats on board and bore tem into a stupor.

> 
> There. SHOOTING! BLAM BLAM! I beam several annoying diplomats on board and bore tem into a stupor.

(Ifbwe survive this,battle, remind me not to allow you to play liaison...)
Units 51, 99, and 4, assist with defense adaptation. Ignore focuses on lower band emissions.
Contacts alliance flagship: admiral, you need to rotate you weapon frequencies to not allow them to adapt.
